items.details: Upcoming Tests Social Studies Chapter 3 December 10th (pages 84-136) Math Topic 7 December 11th Reading Complete up to page 96 in the practice workbook. The story this week is Nature's patchwork quilt https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6u5Y_Ln2imI The spelling test is next Thursday! Please look at the vocabulary every day! interdependence food chain camouflage adaptations quilt patchwork stitched unique niche roots shrimp seashore shallow Arctic ancestors Extra reading ( I have added some new stories) TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills. Go to www.readworks.org/student Enter our class code YU6GQ2 Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it. Math Complete Additional Practice 7-5 (Student book and homework book) I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data. Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.
